title: The House of the Seven Gables

sources.title: The House of the Seven Gables (1940)
sources.description: The House of the Seven Gables , directed by Joe May, is based on Nathaniel Hawthorne's novel of the same name. The film presents a blend of mystery, romance, and supernatural elements.The story is set in a decaying mansion owned by the Pyncheon family, characterized by its dark history and a curse that afflicts its inhabitants.

metadata.Plot: In 1828, the bankrupt Pyncheon family fight over Seven Gables, the ancestral mansion. To obtain the house, Jaffrey Pyncheon obtains his brother Clifford's false conviction for murder. Hepzibah, Clifford's sweet fianc√©e, patiently waits twenty years for his release, whereupon Clifford and his former cellmate, abolitionist Matthew, have a certain scheme in mind.
metadata.Writer: Lester Cole, Harold Greene, Nathaniel Hawthorne
metadata.Actors: George Sanders, Margaret Lindsay, Vincent Price
